verses.verse: A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of praise <S%H8426><s%>. Make a joyful noise <S%H7321><s%> <S%H8685><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, all ye lands <S%H776><s%>.
Serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> with gladness <S%H8057><s%>: come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8798><s%> before his presence <S%H6440><s%> with singing <S%H7445><s%>.

Know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8798><s%> ye that the YY <S%H3068><s%> he is 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>: it is he that hath made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> us, and not we ourselves; we are his people <S%H5971><s%>, and the sheep <S%H6629><s%> of his pasture <S%H4830><s%>.

Enter <S%H935><s%> <S%H8798><s%> into his gates <S%H8179><s%> with thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%>, and into his courts <S%H2691><s%> with praise <S%H8416><s%>: be thankful <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8685><s%> unto him, and bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8761><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%>.
For the YY <S%H3068><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%>; his mercy <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting <S%H5769><s%>; and his truth <S%H530><s%> endureth to all <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>.
